Package com.alepe.rest_demo.auth

Class AuthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alepe.rest_demo.auth.AuthService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intellisrc.web.Serviciable, com.intellisrc.web.ServiciableAuth
    public class AuthService
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.intellisrc.web.ServiciableAuth
    This class is used to authenticate users into the service and authorize other services. It uses a session object for authorization.

    NOTE: Using session for authorization may not be ideal for a public API as there may be clients which don't support it. For this particular project we can control the client, so this is the simplest solution.

    Access: Public

    Since:
    1/18/20.
